changes: Fixed getting badgeNumber from vms_bossmenu for QB-Core
Fixed a bug that sometimes prevented gangs from changing grades for their members
Changed the method for checking target availability from job to canInteract for qb-target

Added Stash section and ability to customize permissions for grades, in addition, in Config.JobMenusSettings possible to configure allowStash, stashSettings
Config.Inventory: by default compatible with ox_inventory, qb-inventory, origen_inventory, tgiann-inventory, if you have custom you need to make changes in CL.OpenStash / SV.openStash, SV.registerAllStashes
Added support for Renewed-Banking, tgg-banking in Config.Banking
Added Badge column to employee list in menu
Added sql execute for ESX in SV.setPlayerJob and SV.gangPlayerJob to avoid the requirement to wait for the employee list to update
Added automatic entry of badge column when using Config.AutoExecuteQuery
Modified functions that search for the current compatible resource in use
If your rank does not have access to the Options button in employees list, you will not see the entire column
Changed the method for checking target availability from groups to canInteract because target systems do not have the ability to check the gang
Changed method of getting data from database for qb-core from SELECT * to specify columns
Fixed bug preventing some users from opening menus
Added badge number system and its assignment to employees (* Requires adding a new column to its users/players table).
Added support for displaying a list of employees using job duty for ESX, which works like police/offpolice - Config.UseOffDutyJobName & Config.OffDutyJobNamePrefix
Created new server-side exports: getPlayerBadge, getPlayerBadges, setPlayerBadge
Fixed the ability to scroll the list of employee ranks in the clothing section
Fixed a bug that, for some users, required a restart of the resource to load the jobs list from the framework
Added version_check.lua file to check script version and inform about updates
Fixed Society doesnt exist!
